mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase (purchaseno, productno, memberno, purname, purregdate, purmemo, purprice, purdateto, purdatefrom, purmethod) VALUES (purchase_sequence.nextval, #{ productNo }, #{ memberNo }, #{ purName }, #{ purRegdate }, #{ purMemo }, #{ purPrice }, #{ purDateto }, #{ purDatefrom }, #{ purMethod })
